workflow.name: Discover & analyze SEO backlinks with ScrapeGraphAI and Google Sheets
workflow.description:
# How it works

This workflow automatically discovers and analyzes backlinks for any website, providing comprehensive SEO insights and competitive intelligence using AI-powered analysis.

## Key Steps

1. **Website Input** - Accepts target URLs via webhook or manual input for backlink analysis.
2. **Backlink Discovery** - Scrapes and crawls the web to find all backlinks pointing to the target website.
3. **AI-Powered Analysis** - Uses GPT-4 to analyze backlink quality, relevance, and SEO impact.
4. **Data Processing & Categorization** - Cleans, validates, and automatically categorizes backlinks by type, authority, and relevance.
5. **Database Storage** - Saves processed backlink data to PostgreSQL database for ongoing analysis and reporting.
6. **API Response** - Returns structured summary with backlink counts, domain authority scores, and SEO insights.

## Set up steps

**Setup time: 8-12 minutes**

1. **Configure OpenAI credentials** - Add your OpenAI API key for AI-powered backlink analysis.
2. **Set up PostgreSQL database** - Connect your PostgreSQL database and create the required table structure.
3. **Configure webhook endpoint** - The workflow provides a `/analyze-backlinks` endpoint for URL submissions.
4. **Customize analysis parameters** - Modify the AI prompt to include your preferred SEO metrics and analysis criteria.
5. **Test the workflow** - Submit a sample website URL to verify the backlink discovery and analysis process.
6. **Set up database table** - Ensure your PostgreSQL database has a `backlinks` table with appropriate columns.

## Features

- **Comprehensive backlink discovery**: Finds all backlinks pointing to target websites
- **AI-powered analysis**: GPT-4 analyzes backlink quality, relevance, and SEO impact
- **Automatic categorization**: Backlinks categorized by type (dofollow/nofollow), authority level, and relevance
- **Data validation**: Cleans and validates backlink data with error handling
- **Database storage**: PostgreSQL integration for data persistence and historical tracking
- **API responses**: Clean JSON responses with backlink summaries and SEO insights
- **Competitive intelligence**: Analyzes competitor backlink profiles and identifies link building opportunities
- **Authority scoring**: Calculates domain authority and page authority metrics for each backlink

parameters.userPrompt: Find all the backlinks pointing to competitor websites in our niche. Extract the following information for each backlink: { "source_url": "https://example.com/page", "target_url": "https://competitor.com", "anchor_text": "relevant keyword", "domain_authority": "65", "page_title": "Page Title", "context": "surrounding text context" }

nodes.name: Backlink Opportunity Analyzer
nodes.notes:
Analyzes and scores
backlink opportunities
based on multiple factors

parameters.userPrompt: Find contact information on this website including email addresses, contact forms, social media profiles, and any team member information. Return data in this format: { "emails": ["contact@example.com", "info@example.com"], "contact_forms": ["https://example.com/contact"], "social_media": { "twitter": "@handle", "linkedin": "company-page" }, "team_members": [{ "name": "John Doe", "role": "Content Manager", "email": "user@example.com" }] }

nodes.name: Data Merger and Outreach Preparation
nodes.notes:
Combines opportunity data
with contact info and
prepares outreach materials

parameters.content:
# Step 1: Weekly Schedule Trigger ‚è∞

This trigger automatically runs the backlink opportunity finder workflow every week to discover fresh link building prospects.

## Configuration Options
- **Frequency**: Weekly execution (recommended for backlink research)
- **Day & Time**: Configure for optimal business hours
- **Time Zone**: Set according to your team's location

## Best Practices
- Weekly frequency balances fresh data with API rate limits
- Schedule during business hours for immediate follow-up
- Monitor execution logs for any failures
- Adjust timing based on competitor activity patterns

## Benefits
- Consistent lead generation
- Automated opportunity discovery
- Fresh backlink prospects weekly
- Reduced manual research time

# Step 2: AI-Powered Competitor Backlink Scraper üï∑Ô∏è

Utilizes ScrapeGraphAI to intelligently extract backlink data from competitor analysis tools and websites.

## How it Works
- Scrapes competitor backlink profiles
- Extracts source URLs, anchor text, and domain metrics
- Uses AI to understand page context and relevance
- Identifies high-value linking opportunities

## Configuration
- **Website URL**: Backlink analysis tool or competitor site
- **User Prompt**: Natural language extraction instructions
- **API Credentials**: ScrapeGraphAI API key required

## Data Extracted
- Source website URLs
- Target competitor URLs
- Anchor text used
- Domain authority scores
- Page titles and context

‚ö†Ô∏è **Note**: Requires ScrapeGraphAI community node

# Step 3: Backlink Opportunity Analyzer üìä

Processes and scores each discovered backlink opportunity using a sophisticated algorithm.

## Scoring Factors
- **Domain Authority** (40% weight): Higher DA = better opportunity
- **Anchor Text Relevance** (20 points): Relevant keywords boost score
- **Content Context** (15 points): Meaningful surrounding text
- **Content Relevance** (25 points): AI-assessed topical alignment

## Priority Classification
- **High Priority**: Score > 70 (immediate outreach)
- **Medium Priority**: Score 40-70 (follow-up queue)
- **Low Priority**: Score < 40 (long-term prospects)

## Output Enhancement
- Standardized opportunity scoring
- Priority-based categorization
- Analysis timestamp for tracking
- Structured data for next steps

# Step 4: High Priority Opportunity Filter üéØ

Filters opportunities to focus outreach efforts on the highest-value prospects first.

## Filter Criteria
- **Priority Level**: High priority opportunities only
- **Score Threshold**: Opportunities scoring > 70 points
- **Quality Focus**: Best prospects for immediate action

## Benefits
- Focused outreach efforts
- Higher conversion rates
- Efficient resource allocation
- Better ROI on link building

## Workflow Logic
- High priority ‚Üí Contact finder ‚Üí Outreach
- Medium/Low priority ‚Üí Storage only
- Failed opportunities ‚Üí Analysis for improvement

## Customization
- Adjust score thresholds
- Add additional filter criteria
- Modify priority definitions
- Include domain-specific rules

# Step 5: AI-Powered Contact Information Finder üë•

Uses ScrapeGraphAI to intelligently find contact information on target websites for outreach campaigns.

## Contact Discovery
- **Email Addresses**: Primary and secondary contacts
- **Contact Forms**: Direct submission options
- **Social Media**: Twitter, LinkedIn, Facebook profiles
- **Team Members**: Individual contact details and roles

## AI Capabilities
- Natural language processing for contact extraction
- Smart recognition of contact patterns
- Multi-format email detection
- Social media profile identification

## Data Structure
- Organized contact arrays
- Role-based team member info
- Social media handle extraction
- Contact form URL discovery

## Quality Assurance
- Validates email formats
- Filters spam/generic addresses
- Prioritizes decision-maker contacts

# Step 6: Data Merger and Outreach Preparation üîó

Combines backlink opportunity data with contact information to create comprehensive outreach records.

## Data Integration
- Merges opportunity scores with contact details
- Creates unified prospect profiles
- Generates personalized outreach materials
- Prepares campaign-ready data

## Outreach Enhancement
- **Personalized Subjects**: Dynamic subject line generation
- **Custom Messages**: Contextual outreach templates
- **Relationship Mapping**: Contact role identification
- **Follow-up Planning**: Automated scheduling preparation

## Status Tracking
- Outreach attempt counters
- Campaign status management
- Response tracking preparation
- Success metric foundations

## Output Quality
- Complete prospect profiles
- Ready-to-send communications
- Tracking-enabled records

# Step 7: Google Sheets Opportunity Tracker üìà

Stores all backlink opportunities in Google Sheets for comprehensive campaign management and analysis.

## Data Storage
- **Complete Opportunity Records**: All discovered prospects
- **Contact Information**: Email, social, team details
- **Scoring Data**: Priority levels and opportunity scores
- **Campaign Status**: Outreach progress tracking

## Sheet Organization
- Structured columns for easy filtering
- Priority-based sorting options
- Historical data preservation
- Export capabilities for reporting

## Team Collaboration
- Shared access for marketing teams
- Real-time updates and synchronization
- Comment and note capabilities
- Progress tracking and accountability

## Analytics Ready
- Performance metrics calculation
- Success rate analysis
- ROI tracking preparation
- Campaign optimization insights

# Step 8: Automated Outreach Email Campaign üìß

Sends personalized outreach emails to high-priority prospects with valid email addresses.

## Email Automation
- **Personalized Content**: Dynamic subject lines and messages
- **Smart Filtering**: Only contacts with valid emails
- **Professional Templates**: Pre-crafted outreach messages
- **Tracking Integration**: Campaign performance monitoring

## Message Personalization
- References specific page content
- Includes relevant anchor text context
- Mentions competitor relationships
- Suggests mutual benefits

## Delivery Features
- SMTP configuration support
- Bulk sending capabilities
- Delivery status tracking
- Bounce management

## Best Practices
- Respectful outreach frequency
- Value-focused messaging
- Professional tone and branding
- Compliance with email regulations

‚ö†Ô∏è **Note**: Configure SMTP credentials for email sending

data.details: The Code node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow.

The Filter node can be used to filter items based on a condition. If the condition is met, the item will be passed on to the next node. If the condition is not met, the item will be omitted. Conditions can be combined together by AND(meet all conditions), or OR(meet at least one condition).
